1289262305558110219.text: Finally, it also contains provisions which would erode religious liberties and hurt second amendment protections. As we work to ensure the safety and security of all Americans, this legislation raises serious concerns and that is why I voted against it. (5/5)

1289262304538722306.text: It doesn't fund the border wall and prevents seized funds from being used to secure our southern border, it also hurts efforts to address backlogs of immigration cases allowing for potential criminals to stay in our country longer while holding up legal immigration (4/5)

1289262303422984193.text: It prevents Law Enforcement from receiving needed equipment such as bulletproof vests, underfunds federal enforcement agencies, and holds hostage funding for school protection and drug trafficking investigations until states and municipalities enact partisan reform measures (3/5)

1289262302290534401.text: This legislation repeals Authorizations of Military force (AUMF) - greatly reducing the ability to carry out counter-terrorism operations, and weakens national security by emboldening Iran to attack us or our allies without fear of retribution (2/5)

1289262300847722498.text: Today I voted against H.R. 7617 – a massive piece of legislation that exceeds budget limits and includes many provisions which hurt our military readiness, weaken law enforcement, and encourage illegal immigration (1/5)
